tmdbpp.name: Movie Db Popular People
tmdbpp.details:
Displaying a list of popular people (actors, directors ..etc) from the movie db site API.

Displaying the details of person on selecting him/her with the ability of displaying and downloading profile images in full size.

studentPortal.name: Student Portal
studentPortal.details:
Student portal for universities working with "Ibn Al-Haitham" student information system.

Displaying student data, study timetables, exam timetables and results.

Displaying list of restaurants inside university and menus of each restaurant.

Notifying student about announced results through push notifications.
studentPortal.lang: Java for Android - Swift for iOS

patientReservation.name: Ibn Sina Patient Reservation
patientReservation.details:
Patient reservation system based on "Ibn Sina" hospitals system.

Patients can reserve appointment date through the application.

ftapp.name: FT App
ftapp.details:
Displaying a list of request with voice and images.

Displaying list of requests with images included in details and voice.

User can zoom images in details in and out.

User can listen to voice response and record and send one.

ibnalhaithamAcademic.name: Ibn Al-Haitham Academic
ibnalhaithamAcademic.details:
Ibn Al-Haitham student information system for academic year.

Displaying student data and latest result.

Notifying student about announced results through push notifications.
ibnalhaithamAcademic.lang: Java for Android - Swift for iOS

ibnalhaithamPost.name: Ibn Al-Haitham Post Graduate
ibnalhaithamPost.details:
Ibn Al-Haitham for post graduate students.

Apply for post graduate through creating an account and filling the required data.

Get push notification when you accepted.

After being accepted you can login as student and view your data.

Register your academic courses when registration is open.
ibnalhaithamPost.lang: Java for Android - Swift for iOS

munews.name: Mansoura University News
munews.details:
Mansoura University news feed.

Display a list of the latest news.

Displaying the details of the news.

ibnalhaithamCredit.name: Ibn Al-Haitham Credit
ibnalhaithamCredit.details:
Ibn Al-Haitham student information system for credit hours.

Displaying student data, study timetables, exam timetables and results.

Notifying student about announced results through push notifications.

future.name: Future Library
future.lang: Java for Android - Cordova for iOS

wdip.name: Where did I Park
wdip.details:
Save the place you parked your car at.

Add landmark to your location.

Get directions to your car.

yts.name: YTS.AG
yts.details:
Display list of latest movies.

Search for the movie you want.

View details of movie including torrent links to download movie.
